name: unnerve

effect.scarlet_violet: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
effect.the_teal_mask: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.

short_effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
